Welcome to Counter-Strike: Source a game with no storyline what so ever, so it is already INFERIOR TO THE CALL OF DUTY FRANCHISE, In this game you can play as either the terrorists (THE FUCKING OVERPOWERED TEAM) or the counter-terrorists (TRY HARDS).

The multiplayer is flawed due to the horrible netcode and the fact there is no class selection or even killstreaks for that matter, the AK47 Is op and is overused by people who obviously suck at the game and dont get me started on the AWP.

Overall this game is to be played by people who love pain and people who also love to be bored to tears whilst playing a game.

1/10 - Call of duty does it better.
96/100 rating my only complaint is the changed physics

Oh boy I played this game some years ago for the first time on another Steam ccount, and I was blown away. CS is just awesome, you don't have to shoot, but you can also play surf for example. Many possibilities, still one of the most played Steam games, I do recommend, even if you have CSGO already.

Das gute alte Counter Strike hat wieder einmal gezeigt wie man es macht.
Aufjedenfall ein kauf wert.

This really is a kind of timeless game, which is really one of Valve's best.
So yes, the graphics are vastly updated compared to the new Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. But the gameplay is there. The vast amounts of gamemodes are there. And it can be addictive, from time to time. 
The deathmatch can be fun, and you can see the differences Valve have made over the years, especially if you look at the original counter-strike. There's lots of other gamemodes too, such as:

Gungame, which is great fun, Minigames (depending on the map, in my opinion) etc. These gamemodes differ from the actual game itself in their own way, and can make Counter-Strike Source a varied, all-round game!

-All in all a masterpiece of Multiplayer, peerless, extremely vicious, great to play with friends.
